name: A Little Lost (ZOnlee1)
description:
"WASD" or "←↑↓→" to accelerate as you fly around.

"SPACE" to squeak for echolocation.

Headphones recommended.  Make sure you're clicked into the game window.  The game begins black with audio, so don't worry if you can't see anything immediately.

Navigate the cave you're in and try to find your family after getting separated.  See unique cavern features such as stalactites, stalagmites, soda straws, and draperies.

I'm "Zee-Only-One" but you can call me "Z".

Background Music: Circle of Life by Whitesand -
